casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ricky D. WAGONER 326P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Ricky D. Wagoner, for Wagoner, Ricky D. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of October 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

*490"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
